resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156819</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156819</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">English Zone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Zone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zone Anglaise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Zona Inglesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zona Inglese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική ζώνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Zona Inglesa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The English Zone is an English learning portal with something of everything in English, including vocabulary, spelling, grammar, language games, words and expressions and a variety of exercises and homework items.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">verbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die englische Zone ist ein erlernenportal Englisch
mit etwas von alles auf englisch, einschließlich Wortschatz, 
Rechtschreibung, Grammatik, Sprachenspiele, Wörter und Ausdrücke und
eine Vielzahl von Übungen und von Heimarbeit Einzelteilen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La zone anglaise est un portail d'étude de 
l'anglais avec quelque chose de tout en anglais, y compris le 
vocabulaire, épellation, grammaire, jeux de langage, mots et 
expressions et une variété d'exercices et d'éléments de travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A zona inglesa é um portal de aprendizagem do 
inglês com algo de tudo em inglês, including o vocabulário, 
soletração, gramática, jogos da língua, palavras e expressões e 
uma variedade dos exercícios e dos artigos do homework.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La zona inglese è un portal imparante di inglese 
con qualcosa di tutto in inglese, compreso vocabolario, ortografia, la
grammatica, giochi di linguaggio, parole ed espressioni e una varietà
di esercitazioni e di articoli di lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αγγλική ζώνη είναι μια αγγλική πύλη εκμάθησης με 
κάτι όλων στα αγγλικά, συμπεριλαμβανομένου του λεξιλογίου, της 
ορθογραφίας, της γραμματικής, των γλωσσικών παιχνιδιών, των 
λέξεων και των εκφράσεων και ποικίλων ασκήσεων και αντικειμένων 
εργασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La zona inglesa es un portal que aprende del 
inglés con algo de todo en inglés, incluyendo vocabulario, deletreo,
gramática, los juegos del lenguaje, las palabras y las expresiones y 
una variedad de ejercicios y de items de la preparación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">verbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">verbos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">verbi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρήματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">verbos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
